summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to capital projects funding; creating the Housing Development Fund; decreasing appropriations of $15,500,000 for housing projects in Ordinance 117100 from the Capital Facilities Projects Fund, 1992; transferring undesignated and unreserved balances from the General Fund to the Housing Development Fund; and appropriating $15,500,000 from the Housing Development Fund for housing projects targeted in Ordinance 117100; all by a three-fourths vote.
